description: Huddersfield return to winning ways as they claim a win over Mansfield.
title: Huddersfield Town 2-1 Mansfield Town
title_page: Huddersfield Town 2-1 Mansfield Town - BBC Sport
maintext:
Huddersfield Town have lost just one of their last 12 league games against Mansfield Town (W7 D4), though that sole defeat did come in this exact fixture the last time it was played in May 2004 (3-1).
Mansfield Town have won five of their last six league games against sides from Yorkshire (L1), though that sole defeat came against Huddersfield Town in the reverse fixture this season (1-0).
Huddersfield have won just one of their last eight home league games (D3 L4), though that sole victory came in their last outing on home soil. In that 5-1 win over Crawley Town, the Yorkshire side scored the same amount of goals as across their prior 10 home matches combined.
After winning their last away league game 2-1 against Bristol Rovers, Mansfield will be looking to record consecutive victories on the road for the first time since October last year.
